t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov

t: Searching and Browsing for Items - Amazon Customer Service
s: Are you looking for a specific item? Enter a few words into the search box and select the magnifying glass icon. We'll show you the matching results.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 2 weeks ago - The deal represents a win for Amazon, which has sought to attract more high-end brands to its platform. 3 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
